author: battibass
body:
A customisation function to unpack `hltMuonDTDigis` using the legacy DT unpacker (`DTUnpackingModule`) is added as, by default, HLT menus will now use the uROS unpacker (`DTuROSRawToDigi`).
 
This cmplements the HLT Jira ticket: https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-1709 , where a more detailed description of the change is given.
title: Customisation function to run legacy DT unpacker at HLT
